title: Hey guys who wamts to set up a nice leageu club??
body:
We can just have it for fun games just screwin around :3. I love all the people on my favorite forum and want tro play games with you cool dudes!

This is just me asking you cool dudes first >///< I dont want to maek the club if no1 ends up joining that would be majorly embarassing.

replies.body:
I feel discord is better than league clubs for forming clubs of people to play league but when I get back to australia in a couple of days, sure, I'd like to join your club Niji.

IGN: Nightjar

I'm very bad at league, but I consider myself a very friendly player.
Who wouldn't join your club though?
Some poeple on boards don't like me vry much :( I tryy to be nice but sometimes I lose controls of my self and be majorly rude
its ok i love u for who r u bby ill join ur club <3

> [{quoted}](name=Rengorax,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=FquspEq9,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-09T10:33:24.795+0000)
>
> You are a loser lol

WOW why aret you insulting my friend? Y does you come in here just ot be toxin????
exactly players get banned for this ingame!! where are the mods im offended >:(
Sounds good to me, but why don't we just use the GD club?

> [{quoted}](name=DarkShade918,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=FquspEq9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-09T10:15:16.401+0000)
